title: Quiz in CLI
description: A small quiz cli app with time limit. Quiz questions can be uploaded via CSV

title: Chromium Updater
description: A simple Chromium updater for Linux x64. Since chromium is frequently releasing builds, this utility makes sure you have the latest version of browser.

title: Tweetiss
description: A github bot which tweets the issues opened in your github repository.

title: Battery prophet
description: Browser reminder that encourages best battery practices for your laptop by sending reminders on when to connect and disconnect the power
